data.name: Citywars Tower Defense
data.detailed_description:
Join Our Discord Server



About the Game



More than 30 unique towers to build and counting! Discover their special abilities and upgrade them for maximum damage! Each merchant will be happy to show you their special inventory of new and exciting towers. Or take a chance with the mystery chess and get a random tower for less.

Try out the:
ðŸŸ Thunder Tower (electrifie multiple enemy at a time)
ðŸ”µ Healing tower (Heal you and you friends while you fight)
ðŸŸ Guardian Tower (spawn an allie that will patrol)
ðŸ”µSlam Tower (attack with a powerful wave but short range) And more!



Start gathering resources quickly before the enemies attack! Starting with no tools and no resources will be hard but craft the right tools and you will discover a whole new set of resources to cut, mine and gather. Craft the missing resources to upgrade your towers and beat the incoming monsters from reaching your life crystal. Use the crafting table to help you quickly progress.

Some handy tools:
ðŸŸ Stone Axe (chopping up trees, chop ,chop)
ðŸ”µWooden club (got to defend that crystal)
ðŸŸ Iron Shovel (diggity coal and clay)
ðŸ”µStone Pickaxe (Iron hear I come) And more!



Each tool and each weapon in the game has a special skill tree to help you defend your crystal with greater ease. Choose between more than a dozen weapons and armors with unique features. Claim skill points by defeating waves and collecting the experience points from monsters.

Choose from:
ðŸŸ Scavenger (Give 20% of getting 2 extra item when gathering)
ðŸ”µSpin Attack (Push back enemies near you)
ðŸŸ Large Quiver (Shoot more arrow on a target)
ðŸ”µKeen Eye 2 (60% Chance to find extra item) And more!

data.short_description: Citywars TD is a cute multiplayer third person Survival Tower Defense. Build towers, gather resources, craft tools, upgrade weapons, level up buildings, expand your city with your friends and work under pressure before the next incoming wave of monsters.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Italian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x86/x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2XXX @ 2.0GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 @ 2.6GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphics driver: OpenGL 3.2 or DirectX 11.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphics driver: OpenGL 3.2 or DirectX 11.0
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2XXX @ 2.0GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 @ 2.6GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphics driver: OpenGL 3.2 or DirectX 11.0
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
